sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The ncftp package contains ncftp, ncftpbatch, ncftpbookmarks, ncftpget, ncftpls, ncftpput and ncftpspooler.

sect3.title: ncftp
sect3.para: A browser program for File Transfer Protocol

sect3.title: ncftpget
sect3.para: Internet file transfer program for scripts

sect3.title: ncftpls
sect3.para: Internet file transfer program for scripts

sect3.title: ncftpput
sect3.para: Internet file transfer program for scripts

sect3.title: ncftpspooler
sect3.para: Global batch FTP job processor daemon
